root.name: Pssst
root.description: Pssst was an early game from Ultimate Play The Game that involved defending various plants that took up the center of the screen from attacking pests Each pest had a specific movement pattern towards the plant and could only be killed with the matching pest spray that had the same color as them. If the pests landed on the plant then they would begin to eat it and shrink it down the screen and if the plant shrank all the way then the game ended.
